products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Taupe Brown Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. Product id: sdb-pfr0536 fabric colour: taupe brown material: 3 ply vinyl, 1 ply fibreglass lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes lintex pvc blackout taupe brown perfect fit roller blind in brown.
